Title: Centre to set up 'Anomaly Committee' for implementation of 7th pay commission
Content: The centre on Wednesday announced setting up of an 'Anomaly Committee' to settle issues arising out of the implementation of the Seventh Pay Commission's recommendations from August 1. This announ
Author: B. MURALIDHAR REDDY
